channel.title: Dicing in Chat

item.title: Dicing in Chat
item.dc:creator: @eighteenmilla eighteenmilla
item.description:
@eighteenmilla wrote:

if(playerCommand.startsWith(“roll”)){
int random = Misc.random(100);
c.forcedChat("{" + c.properName + “} Rolled " + random + " On The Percentile Die”);
c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc
c.startAnimation(827);

What would i add in order for the dicing amount to appear in chat?

Read full topic
